IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
To slit something
pomeni narediti dolgo ozko zarezo v nekaj.

seg.quote: She got a knife and slit the envelope.
He slit open the packet with his thumb nail.

sense.def:
A slit
je dolga ozka odprtina, ki jo naredimo z rezilom.

seg.quote: We make a tiny slit in it with a razor blade.

sense.def:
A slit
je tudi dolga ozka odprtina v nečem.

seg.quote: ...neon light came through the slits in the blind.
